sections.heading: Bonds; successive terms; sureties; qualification
sections.text: No person shall be surety for the same officer for more than two successive terms of the same office; but this provision shall not apply to incorporated surety companies.SourceLaws 1881, c. 13, ยง 18, p. 98;Laws 1905, c. 11, ยง 1, p. 64;R.S.1913, ยง 5724
